member.name: P:Codefarts.IoC.Container.MaxInstantiationDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the max instantiation depth.
member.remarks: Max instantiation depth prevents the method from making circular instantiation references.

member.name: P:Codefarts.IoC.Container.RegisteredTypes
member.summary: Gets the types that have been registered with the container.

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.Resolve(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates instance of a specified type.
member.param: Specifies the type to be instantiated.
Arguments to be passed to the type constructor.
member.returns: Returns a reference to a instance of .

remarks.p: Will attempt to resolve the type even if there was no previous type delegate specified for the type.
If no specified, will attempt to satisfy args automatically.

member.summary: Registers a delegate for a given type.
member.param: The type to be registered.
The creator delegate used to create the type.

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.Register(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Registers a type key with a concrete type.
member.param: The type of the key.
The type of the concrete class.

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.Unregister(System.Type)
member.summary: Unregister a type from the container.
member.param: The type to be unregistered.
member.returns: true if the type was successfully unregistered; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.CanResolve(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether the type can be resolved.
member.param: The type to check if it can be resolved.
member.returns: true if the type can be resolved; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: checks property to see if a type has previously been registered with a .

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.ResolveByType(System.Int32,System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a instance of a type.
member.param: Specified the instantiation depth.
The type that is to be instantiated.
Arguments to be passed to the type constructor.
member.returns: The reference to the created instance.

remarks.p: Attempts to create the specified with the most number of constructor arguments that can be satisfied.
Constructors with value types are ignored and only public constructors are considered.

member.exception: Thrown if the type could not be constructed because none of the available constructors could be satisfied.

member.name: M:Codefarts.IoC.Container.PreviouslyRegisteredCheck(System.Type)
member.summary: Checks for previously registered type and if found throws an exception.
member.param: The type to check.
member.exception: If type has been registered already.
